message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counteroffer at $150 for the product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Let me know if that works for you.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I'd like to counteroffer at $155.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but I'm not willing to go any lower. Let me know if this is the price you're willing to pay.
Considering my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $160.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $170, Bob. I think this is a fair price considering the value I know the product has. Let's meet at this price or we can discuss other options.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $165.
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $175, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer, let me know if it's acceptable.
Considering my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $170.
